Featured-image: CP801-red-elegant-prom-gown-with-full-skirt_p.jpg

Description: An elegant prom gown with a full skirt that reaches the floor. The halter top is beaded with circular design patterns for a fun style. The back of the bodice is a razor back style and is beaded with the same circular pattern.
